base: dozens of long, bleeding cuts across her body as if fresh from the lash
nails like knives, slick with gore
eyes perpetually weeping blood
a mouth unnaturally wide & filled with needle teeth, her cheeks pink & rosy
her lips & tongue scarred with burns
an open, sucking, star-shaped wound over the heart
frost forming over the skin
a deathly paleness & no blood in her body
freakishly long, multiply jointed fingers
eyes of chipped ice
translucent skin, muscle & organs
teeth that are jagged, eternal icicles
sharp thorns growing out from vines visible under her skin
hair of flowering plants
shelves of mushrooms protruding from her body
webbed feet & fingers, & a patagium running from wrist to hip
eight eyes in a spiderlike band
her flesh gravely poisonous & incorruptible
her exhaled breath pluming in clouds of narcotic smoke
her skin horned & discoloured like that of a toad
a permanent static charge, her hair standing on end
thick ivory talons on each finger
her veins pressing out from skin in weblike patterns
patches of iridescent scales
the complexion of a drowned corpse
a cadaverous thinness, bones jutting out at sharp angles
a dark, corrosive ichor leaking from her wounds
stagnant water running from her open mouth
one side of her body withered & rotten, bearing the mark of many plagues
pharyngeal jaws
eyes burning like embers in their sockets
teeth & nails of many precious metals
her shadow smoking from the ground in black vapours
bones of solid gold
her blood, spit & snot running scalding hot
gemstones & crystals growing out from her body like tumours
